body:
Instead of this, can we use a more general approach, namely a list of URLs, such as 

```
SOURCE_URLS = ['http://yann.lecun.com/exdb/mnist/', 'https://web.archive.org/web/20160828233817/http://yann.lecun.com/exdb/mnist/']
```

and let the code try them one by one until the first successful one? If all failed, throw an exception.
